IMAGE_VALIDATION_ERROR_INVALID_COLOR_COM: Invalid image color. It must contain only black and white (not grayscale).
IMAGE_VALIDATION_ERROR_INVALID_FORMAT: Invalid file selected. Must be .jpg or .png
IMAGE_VALIDATION_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_ALPHA: Invalid image format. It must not contain transparencies.
RECIPIENT_REQUIRES_UPDATE: Taproot is not supported by your firmware version. Please update your device firmware.
SETTINGS_ADV_COIN_BLOCKFROST_DESCRIPTION: Trezor Suite uses Blockfrost websocket-link for the wallet backend.
SETTINGS_ADV_COIN_CONN_INFO_NO_CONNECTED: Not connected to the backend. Try reconnecting the device. Also, check your internet connection or the URL of your custom backend.
TR_ACCOUNT_TYPE_SHELLEY_DESC: Shelley era addresses have introduced a new type of wallet that can support stake delegation and earning rewards.
TR_BACKUP_SUBHEADING_1: Your Trezor will generate a list of words which you need to write down. This information is the most important part of securing your Trezor: it is the only offline backup of your Trezor and all wallets associated with it.
TR_DEVICE_SETTINGS_HOMESCREEN_IMAGE_SETT: Supports PNG or JPG, 128 x 64 pixels, and using only black and white (not grayscale).
Supports PNG or JPG, 144 x 144 pixels
TR_DRY_RUN_CHECK_ITEM_TITLE: I understand this is a simulated check and it won’t affect my device
TR_EXCHANGE_FEES_INFO: All fees included; the transaction fee is estimated at {feeAmount} ({feeAmountFiat}).
TR_FORMAT_TOOLTIP: Trezor – standard signature format according to BIP137 Electrum – compatibility signature format
TR_RECEIVING_SYMBOL: Receiving {multiple, select, true {multiple tokens} false {{symbol}} other {{symbol}}}
TR_SELL_DETAIL_WAITING_FOR_SEND_CRYPTO_I: Please allow them a moment to generate the address where you'll send your crypto.
TR_SENDING_SYMBOL: Sending {multiple, select, true {multiple tokens} false {{symbol}} other {{symbol}}}
TR_SENDING_SYMBOL_TO_SELF: Sending {multiple, select, true {multiple tokens} false {{symbol}} other {{symbol}}} to myself
TR_SENT_SYMBOL_TO_SELF: Sent {multiple, select, true {multiple tokens} false {{symbol}} other {{symbol}}} to myself
TR_STAKING_DEPOSIT_FEE_DECRIPTION: The deposit fee is {feeAmount} ADA and is required to register your address to start staking. If you choose to unstake your Cardano you will get the deposit back.
TR_STAKING_NOT_ENOUGH_FUNDS: You don't have enough funds on your account.
TR_STAKING_ON_3RD_PARTY_DESCRIPTION: By staking on Trezor stake pool you are directly supporting Trezor and the Cardano ecosystem within Trezor Suite.
TR_STAKING_ON_3RD_PARTY_TITLE: You are delegating on a 3rd party stake pool
TR_STAKING_POOL_OVERSATURATED_DESCRIPTIO: The stake pool you are delegating on is oversaturated. Please redelegate your stake to maximize your staking rewards
TR_STAKING_REWARDS_DESCRIPTION: Please note that it can take up to 20 days until you start receiving your rewards after initial stake registration and delegation. After this period is completed you will receive you reward every 5 days.
TR_STAKING_STAKE_DESCRIPTION: Staking Cardano is a great way to earn ADA staking rewards as a form of passive income for holding Cardano.{br}By staking your ADA, you actively support the Cardano network and contribute to the stability of the network.
TR_STAKING_TREZOR_POOL_FAIL: Cannot reach Trezor stake pool to delegate on.
TR_STAKING_TX_PENDING: Your transaction {txid} was successfully sent to the blockchain and is waiting for confirmation.
TR_SUITE_WEB_LANDING_BANNER_DESC_FROM_MY: Trezor Suite is a new interface that makes using your Trezor more private and secure.
TR_SUITE_WEB_LANDING_DEPRECATION_BANNER_: Trezor Wallet is no longer supported
Start using Trezor Suite today to enjoy new features, more privacy, and regular updates.

Trezor Suite is a brand new interface for desktop and web that lets you do more with your hardware wallet. The old Trezor Wallet web interface will not be supported from January 31st 2022, so now's the time to get familiar with Trezor Suite.
For all the new features, download the desktop app. Trezor Suite can be accessed in your web browser by clicking the link at the top-right of this page.
This change won't affect your coins or keys. You will find all the same features (and more!), so you can just install the desktop app and continue from where you left off.

• Privacy at the flick of a switch with Tor.
  • A new, more intuitive interface
  • Cheaper transactions with RBF
  • Enough power for exciting upcoming features!
Trezor Suite also has all the features you're used to from the old Trezor Wallet so you can hit the ground running!

<StyledCollapsibleBoxLink>Download and run Trezor Suite for desktop</StyledCollapsibleBoxLink>, plug in your hardware wallet and get set up in seconds!{lineBreak}Alternatively, use the web app to access standard functions (just like in Trezor Wallet). Advanced features are only available using the desktop app.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_10: Tip: You can combine AND (&) and OR (|) operators for more complex searches. For example > 2020-01-01 & < 2020-01-31 | > 2020-12-01 & < 2020-12-31 will show all all transactions in January 2020 or December 2020.
TR_TRANSACTIONS_SEARCH_TIP_2: Tip: You can use the greater than (>) and lesser than (<) symbols on amount searches. For example > 1 will show all transactions that have an amount of 1 or higher.
TR_TROUBLESHOOTING_TIP_BRIDGE_INSTALL_TI: If you can’t see Trezor Bridge running, download and install it
